scripts.build: rm -fr network-rc dist && mkdir network-rc && cp index.js network-rc/ && cp package.json network-rc/ && cp -r lib network-rc/ && cp -r node_modules network-rc/ && mkdir network-rc/front-end && cp -r front-end/build network-rc/front-end/ && cp /usr/bin/node network-rc/ && mkdir dist && tar -zcvf dist/network-rc.tar.gz network-rc && rm -rf network-rc
